title: Add eigenDecomp Stream Evaluator to support eigen decomposition
description:
This ticket adds eigen decomposition support to the Stream Expression machine learning library.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eigendecomposition_of_a_matrix

comments.content: Now that we've got covariance and correlation matrices committed it's time to get this ticket going. The goal is to support PCA and spectral clustering for Solr 7.2.
comments.author: Joel Bernstein

comments.content: Move issue from deprecated 'In  Progress' back to 'Open'
comments.author: Gavin
